description.value:
Whenever you take a short or an extended rest, you can poison one of your weapons or a piece of ammunition. Choose one of the poison effects given below. The next time you attack with the poisoned item before your next short or extended rest, the target suffers the chosen effect if the attack hits. The effect is lost if the attack misses.

The target takes extra poison damage equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.

The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot see any creature more than 4 squares from it.
